item.title: Kbd command in pvp
item.dc:creator: @cocky cocky
item.description:
@cocky wrote:

hey guys, i made an npc spawn at a location, the npc is kbd, i then made a command to tele to the kbd, now, the kbd is in non-pvp, and the command teles me to the kbd spot in pvp. the codes

kbd (npc) code spawn = 50 3223 3357 0 2278 4705 3186 3440 Kbd The kbd (tele) code if (cmd[0].equals("kbd")) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } p.teleportTo(3222, 3355, 4, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); }
Plz help, i am currently hosting the server, and this is the only problem left for me to solve.

Read full topic
